snippet: Bernard James, a 27-year-old senior for Florida State who served in Iraq while in the Air Force, is considered one of the best defensive players in the Atlantic Coast Conference.
abstract: Profile of Florida State men's basketball forward Bernard James, who is considered one of the best defensive players in the Atlantic Coast Conference; James credits his success to the six years he spent in the United States military.
lead_paragraph: Bernard James, a 27-year-old senior for Florida State who served in Iraq while in the Air Force, is considered one of the best defensive players in the Atlantic Coast Conference.

headline.seo: For Florida State Center, Military Was a Steadying Influence
headline.main: For Florida State Center, Military Was a Steadying Influence
